trans-unit.source: The resource contains image data. Currently supported data types are QMetaType::QPixmap and QMetaType::QImage. If the corresponding variant is of type QMetaType::QByteArray then Qt attempts to load the image using QImage::loadFromData. QMetaType::QIcon is currently not supported. The icon needs to be converted to one of the supported types first, for example using QIcon::pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 该资源包含图像数据。当前支持的数据类型是QMetaType :: QPixmap和QMetaType :: QImage。如果相应的变量类型为QMetaType :: QByteArray，则Qt尝试使用QImage :: loadFromData加载图像。当前不支持QMetaType :: QIcon。首先需要将图标转换为支持的类型之一，例如，使用QIcon :: pixmap。

trans-unit.source: The resource contains image data. Currently supported data types are QVariant::Pixmap and QVariant::Image. If the corresponding variant is of type QVariant::ByteArray then Qt attempts to load the image using QImage::loadFromData. QVariant::Icon is currently not supported. The icon needs to be converted to one of the supported types first, for example using QIcon::pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 该资源包含图像数据。当前支持的数据类型是QVariant :: Pixmap和QVariant :: Image。如果相应的变体的类型为QVariant :: ByteArray，则Qt尝试使用QImage :: loadFromData加载图像。当前不支持QVariant :: Icon。首先需要将图标转换为支持的类型之一，例如，使用QIcon :: pixmap。

trans-unit.source: The resource files listed in the .qrc file are files that are part of the application's source tree. The specified paths are relative to the directory containing the .qrc file. Note that the listed resource files must be located in the same directory as the .qrc file, or one of its subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: .qrc 文件中列出的资源文件是属于应用程序源树的一部分的文件。指定的路径是相对于包含 .qrc 文件的目录的。请注意，列出的资源文件必须与 .qrc 文件位于同一目录或其子目录之一。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to a QRhiCommandBuffer instance that is associated with the window and its QQuickRenderControl. The value is null when the window is not associated with a QQuickRenderControl. This value was introduced in Qt 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向与该窗口及其QQuickRenderControl关联的QRhiCommandBuffer实例的指针。当窗口未与QQuickRenderControl关联时，该值为null 。这个值是在Qt 6.0中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to a QRhiSwapchain instance that is associated with the window. The value is null when the window is used in combination with QQuickRenderControl. This value was introduced in Qt 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向与该窗口关联的QRhiSwapchain实例的指针。当窗口与QQuickRenderControl结合使用时，该值为null 。这个值是在Qt 6.0中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to a QRhiTextureRenderTarget instance that is associated with the window and its QQuickRenderControl. The value is null when the window is not associated with a QQuickRenderControl. This value was introduced in Qt 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向与窗口及其QQuickRenderControl关联的QRhiTextureRenderTarget实例的指针。当窗口未与QQuickRenderControl关联时，该值为null 。这个值是在Qt 6.0中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the QOpenGLContext used by the scenegraph (on the render thread), when applicable. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向场景图（在渲染线程上）使用的QOpenGLContext的指针（如果适用）。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the QOpenGLContext used by the scenegraph (on the render thread), when applicable. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向场景图（在渲染线程上）使用的QOpenGLContext的指针（如果适用）。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the QVulkanInstance used by the scenegraph, when applicable. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向场景图使用的QVulkanInstance的指针（如果适用）。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the QRhi instance used by the scenegraph, when applicable. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向scenegraph使用的QRhi实例的指针,如果适用的话。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the active QPainter used by the scenegraph, when running with the software backend.
trans-unit.target: 与软件后端一起运行时，资源是指向场景图使用的活动QPainter的指针。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the command list or buffer used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a VkCommandBuffer * or MTLCommandBuffer *. This object has limited validity, and is only valid while the scene graph is preparing the next frame. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkCommandBuffer, not the handle itself.
trans-unit.target: 资源是指向场景图使用的命令列表或缓冲区的指针（如果适用）。例如， VkCommandBuffer * 或 MTLCommandBuffer * 。该对象的有效性有限，并且仅在场景图准备下一帧时才有效。请注意，使用Vulkan时，返回的值是指向VkCommandBuffer的指针，而不是句柄本身。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the currently active render command encoder object used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a MTLRenderCommandEncoder *. This object has limited validity, and is only valid while the scene graph is recording a render pass for the next frame. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向适用于场景图的当前活动渲染命令编码器对象的指针。例如， MTLRenderCommandEncoder * 。该对象的有效性有限，并且仅在场景图记录下一帧的渲染通道时才有效。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the device context used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a ID3D11DeviceContext *. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向场景图所使用的设备上下文的指针（如果适用）。例如，一个 ID3D11DeviceContext * 。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the graphics command queue used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a VkQueue * or MTLCommandQueue *. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkQueue, not the handle itself.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向适用于场景图的图形命令队列的指针。例如， VkQueue * 或 MTLCommandQueue * 。请注意，使用Vulkan时，返回的值是指向VkQueue的指针，而不是句柄本身。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the graphics device, when applicable. For example, a VkDevice *, MTLDevice * or ID3D11Device *. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkDevice, not the handle itself. This is because Vulkan handles may not be pointers, and may use a different size from the architecture's pointer size so merely casting to/from void * is wrong.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向图形设备的指针（如果适用）。例如， VkDevice * ， MTLDevice * 或 ID3D11Device * 。请注意，使用Vulkan时，返回的值是指向VkDevice的指针，而不是句柄本身。这是因为Vulkan句柄可能不是指针，并且可能使用与体系结构的指针大小不同的大小，因此仅强制转换为 void * 是错误的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the pysical device object used by the scenegraph, when applicable. For example, a VkPhysicalDevice *. Note that with Vulkan the returned value is a pointer to the VkPhysicalDevice, not the handle itself. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向场景图使用的物理设备对象（如果适用）的指针。例如， VkPhysicalDevice * 。请注意，使用Vulkan时，返回的值是指向VkPhysicalDevice的指针，而不是句柄本身。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource is a pointer to the render pass used by the scenegraph, describing the color and depth/stecil attachments and how they are used. For example, a VkRenderPass *. This value was introduced in Qt 5.14.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是指向场景图形使用的渲染通道的指针，描述了颜色和深度/钢笔附件及其使用方式。例如， VkRenderPass * 。这个值是在Qt 5.14中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The resource system is based on tight cooperation between qmake, rcc (Qt's resource compiler), and QFile.
trans-unit.target: 资源系统基于qmake，rcc（Qt的资源编译器）和QFile之间的紧密合作。

trans-unit.source: The resources associated with an application are specified in a .qrc file, an XML-based file format that lists files on the disk and optionally assigns them a resource name that the application must use to access the resource.
trans-unit.target: 与应用程序关联的资源以 .qrc 文件指定，.qrc文件是一种基于XML的文件格式，它列出了磁盘上的文件，并可以选择为它们分配一个资源名称，应用程序必须使用该资源名称来访问该资源。

trans-unit.source: The respective QML properties are WebEngineView.devToolsView and WebEngineView.inspectedView.
trans-unit.target: 各自的QML属性是WebEngineView.devToolsView和WebEngineView.inspectedView。

trans-unit.source: The return value is in degrees, where zero (the default) indicates the finger, token or stylus is pointing upwards, a negative angle means it's rotated to the left, and a positive angle means it's rotated to the right. Most touchscreens do not detect rotation, so zero is the most common value.
trans-unit.target: 返回值以度数为单位,零(默认值)表示手指、令牌或触控笔指向上方,负角度表示向左旋转,正角度表示向右旋转。大多数触摸屏不检测旋转,所以零是最常见的值。

trans-unit.source: The return value is in logical pixels. Most touchscreens do not detect the shape of the contact point, and no mice or tablet devices can detect it, so a null size is the most common value. On some touchscreens the diameters may be nonzero and always equal (the ellipse is approximated as a circle).

trans-unit.source: The reverseProxy() function allows the proxy() functionality to be extended, in effect mirroring the proxy functionality in the "reverse" direction. These are distinct, because node communication is not symmetric, one side calls enableRemoting() with a Source object, the other side calls acquire() to get a Replica. Using proxy() allows you to "observe" objects on a target device remotely via acquire, but it does not allow off-target Source objects to be acquired from the device's local:* network. trans-unit.source: The rich content of a place consists of items such as images, reviews and editorials. Potentially there may be many rich content items, so they are treated separately from the place details. They can be retrieved in a paged fashion via QPlaceManager::getPlaceContent(). If necessary, the content may be assigned to a place so it can act as a convenient container.
trans-unit.target: 一个地方的丰富内容包括图像，评论和社论等项目。可能会有很多丰富的内容项，因此将它们与地点详细信息分开处理。可以通过QPlaceManager :: getPlaceContent（）以分页的方式检索它们。如有必要，可以将内容分配到某个地方，以便可以用作方便的容器。

trans-unit.source: The rich content of a place is typically made available as paginated items. The ability to convert between QPlaceContent and it's subclasses means that code which handles the mechanics of paging can be easily shared for each of the sub types.
trans-unit.target: 通常将地方的丰富内容作为分页项目提供。在QPlaceContent及其子类之间进行转换的能力意味着，可以轻松地为每种子类型共享处理分页机制的代码。

trans-unit.source: The rich text support in Qt is designed to provide a fast, portable and efficient way to add reasonable online help facilities to applications, and to provide a basis for rich text editors. If you find the HTML support insufficient for your needs you may consider the use of Qt WebKit, which provides a full-featured web browser widget.
trans-unit.target: Qt中的富文本支持旨在提供一种快速、便携、高效的方式,为应用程序添加合理的在线帮助设施,并为富文本编辑器提供基础。如果您发现HTML支持不足以满足您的需求,您可以考虑使用Qt WebKit,它提供了一个全功能的Web浏览器小工具。

trans-unit.source: The role names are used by delegates to obtain data from list elements. Each role name is accessible in the delegate's scope, and refers to the corresponding role in the current element. Where a role name would be ambiguous to use, it can be accessed via the model property (e.g., model.cost instead of cost).

trans-unit.source: The rule of thumb for alignment is that a type is aligned to its natural boundary, which is the smallest power of 2 that is bigger than the type, unless that alignment is larger than the maximum useful alignment for the platform. For practical purposes, alignment larger than 2 * sizeof(void*) is only necessary for special hardware instructions (e.g., aligned SSE loads and stores on x86).
trans-unit.target: 对齐的经验法则是,一个类型要对齐到它的自然边界,也就是比类型大的最小的2次方,除非这个对齐大于平台的最大有用对齐。出于实际目的,大于2*sizeof(void*)的对齐只有在特殊的硬件指令中才有必要(例如,x86上对齐的SSE加载和存储)。

trans-unit.source: The same principle applies to any combination of view transitions. An added item may be moved before its add transition finishes, or a moved item may be removed before its moved transition finishes, and so on; so, the rule of thumb is that every transition should handle the same set of properties.
trans-unit.target: 同样的原则适用于任何视图过渡的组合。一个添加的项目可能在它的添加过渡完成之前被移动,或者一个被移动的项目可能在它的移动过渡完成之前被移除,以此类推;所以,经验法则是每个过渡应该处理相同的属性集。

trans-unit.source: The same principle applies to code that throws and catches exceptions. An exception that is not caught in the function that has locked the mutex has no way of unlocking the mutex before the exception is passed up the stack to the calling function.
trans-unit.target: 同样的原则也适用于抛出和捕获异常的代码。一个没有在锁定了mutex的函数中捕捉到的异常,在异常被传递到堆栈中给调用函数之前,无法解锁mutex。

trans-unit.source: The scale factor can be any real number; the default value is 1.0. If you set the factor to 0.0, the item will be collapsed to a single point. If you provide a negative value, the item will be flipped end for end around its origin.

trans-unit.source: The scale factor that either the operating system or Qt applies.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统或Qt应用的比例因子。

trans-unit.source: The scale factor that will automatically be set on the target if it is not null. Otherwise, bindings can be used to do arbitrary things with this value. While the pinch gesture is being performed, it is continuously multiplied by activeScale; after the gesture ends, it stays the same; and when the next pinch gesture begins, it begins to be multiplied by activeScale again.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标不为空，将在目标上自动设置的比例因子。否则，绑定可用于使用此值执行任意操作。在执行捏手势时，它将连续乘以activeScale；手势结束后，它保持不变；当下一个捏合手势开始时，它将再次与activeScale相乘。

trans-unit.source: The scale factor while the pinch gesture is being performed. It is 1.0 when the gesture begins, increases as the touchpoints are spread apart, and decreases as the touchpoints are brought together. If target is not null, its scale will be automatically multiplied by this value. Otherwise, bindings can be used to do arbitrary things with this value.
trans-unit.target: 捏手势执行时的比例因子。手势开始时为1.0，随着接触点的扩展而增加，而随着接触点的聚集而降低。如果target不为null，则其标度将自动乘以该值。否则，绑定可用于使用此值执行任意操作。

trans-unit.source: The scale factors and skew factors are multiples;

trans-unit.target: 比例因子和偏斜因子是倍数； e 和 f 是坐标空间单位，就像平移（x，y）方法中的单位一样。

trans-unit.source: The scale of the values is meters per second squared. The axes are arranged as follows.
trans-unit.target: 值的刻度是米/秒的平方。轴线排列如下:

trans-unit.source: The scaled clip rect (or ROI, Region Of Interest) of the image. A handler that supports this option is expected to apply the provided clip rect (a QRect), after applying any scaling (ScaleSize) or regular clipping (ClipRect). If the handler does not support this option, QImageReader will apply the scaled clip rect after the image has been read.
trans-unit.target: 图像的缩放后的片段矩形（或ROI，感兴趣区域）。在应用任何缩放比例（ScaleSize）或常规裁剪（ClipRect）之后，支持该选项的处理程序都应应用提供的clip rect（QRect）。如果处理程序不支持此选项，则在读取图像后，QImageReader将应用缩放后的片段rect。

trans-unit.source: The scaled device pixel ratio for the device. This is identical to PdmDevicePixelRatio, except that the value is scaled by a constant factor in order to support paint devices with fractional scale factors. The constant scaling factor used is devicePixelRatioFScale(). This enum value has been introduced in Qt 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 该设备的缩放设备像素比。这与PdmDevicePixelRatio相同,只是为了支持具有分数比例因子的涂料设备,该值被一个常数因子缩放。使用的恒定缩放因子是devicePixelRatioFScale()。这个枚举值已经在Qt 5.6中被引入。

trans-unit.source: The scaled size of the image. A handler that supports this option is expected to scale the image to the provided size (a QSize), after applying any clip rect transformation (ClipRect). If the handler does not support this option, QImageReader will perform the scaling after the image has been read.
trans-unit.target: 图像的缩放大小。在应用任何剪切矩形转换（ClipRect）之后，支持该选项的处理程序应将图像缩放到提供的大小（QSize）。如果处理程序不支持此选项，则QImageReader将在读取图像后执行缩放。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the X axis.
trans-unit.target: X轴的缩放系数。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the Y axis.
trans-unit.target: Y轴的缩放系数。

trans-unit.source: The scaling is needed for heights that include a fixed number of pixels, to scale them appropriately for printing.
trans-unit.target: 对于包含固定像素数的高度,需要进行缩放,以便在打印时进行适当的缩放。

trans-unit.source: The scaling to be applied to the rotation property, and to the property on the target item, if any. The default is 1, such that rotation will be in units of degrees of rotation. It can be set to a negative number to invert the effect of the direction of mouse wheel rotation.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于旋转属性以及目标项目上的属性（如果有）的缩放比例。默认值为1，这样旋转将以旋转度为单位。可以将其设置为负数以反转鼠标滚轮旋转方向的影响。

trans-unit.source: The scanline data is aligned on a 32-bit boundary.
trans-unit.target: 扫描线数据在32位边界上对齐。

trans-unit.source: The scanline data is as minimum 32-bit aligned. For 64-bit formats it follows the native alignment of 64-bit integers (64-bit for most platforms, but notably 32-bit on i386).
trans-unit.target: 扫描线数据至少是32位对齐的,对于64位格式的数据,它遵循64位整数的原生对齐方式(大多数平台为64位,但在i386上是32位)。对于64位格式,它遵循64位整数的本机对齐方式(大多数平台为64位,但在i386上主要是32位)。

trans-unit.source: The scatter data is displayed as a collection of points on the chart. For each point, two values are specified that determine its position on the horizontal axis and the vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: 散点数据在图表上显示为点的集合。对于每个点,指定两个值,以确定其在水平轴和垂直轴上的位置。

trans-unit.source: The scatter noise texture map. Default is a Texture with source "maps/brushnoise.png".
trans-unit.target: 散射噪声纹理贴图。默认为带有源 "maps/brushnoise.png" 的纹理。

trans-unit.source: The scatter noise texture map. The default is a Texture with source "maps/brushnoise.png".
trans-unit.target: 散射噪声纹理贴图。默认值为带有源 "maps/brushnoise.png" 的纹理。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph API is low-level and focuses on performance rather than convenience. Writing custom geometries and materials from scratch, even the most basic ones, requires a non-trivial amount of code. For this reason, the API includes a few convenience classes to make the most common custom nodes readily available.
trans-unit.target: 场景图API是低级的,注重的是性能而不是方便。从头开始编写自定义几何图形和材料,即使是最基本的几何图形和材料,也需要大量的代码。出于这个原因,API包含了一些方便的类,使最常见的自定义节点变得容易使用。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph API is very low-level and focuses on performance rather than convenience. Writing custom geometries and materials from scratch, even the most basic ones, requires a non-trivial amount of code. For this reason, the API includes a few convenience classes to make the most common custom nodes readily available.
trans-unit.target: 场景图API是非常低级的,并且注重性能而不是便利性。从头开始编写自定义几何图形和材料,即使是最基本的几何图形和材料,也需要大量的代码。出于这个原因,API包含了一些方便的类,使最常见的自定义节点变得容易使用。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph can reorder geometry nodes to minimize state changes. The compare function is called during the sorting process so that the materials can be sorted to minimize state changes in each call to QSGMaterialShader::updateState().
trans-unit.target: 场景图可以对几何节点重新排序，以最大程度地减少状态变化。在排序过程中将调用compare函数，以便可以对材料进行排序，以最小化每次对QSGMaterialShader :: updateState（）的调用中的状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph can reorder geometry nodes to minimize state changes. The compare function is called during the sorting process so that the materials can be sorted to minimize state changes in each call to QSGMaterialShader::updateState().
trans-unit.target: 场景图可以对几何节点进行重新排序,以最小化状态变化。比较函数在排序过程中被调用,这样可以在每次调用QSGMaterialShader::updateState()时对材料进行排序,以最小化状态变化。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph can support pseudo 3D and proper 3D primitives. For instance, one can implement a "page curl" effect using a ShaderEffect or implement a bumpmapped torus using QSGGeometry and a custom material. While doing so, one needs to take into account that the default renderer already makes use of the depth buffer.
trans-unit.target: 场景图可以支持伪3D和适当的3D图元。例如，可以使用ShaderEffect来实现“页面卷曲”效果，或者可以使用QSGGeometry和自定义材质来实现凹凸贴面。这样做时，需要考虑到默认渲染器已经使用了深度缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph has support for a number of logging categories. These can be useful in tracking down both performance issues and bugs in addition to being helpful to Qt contributors.
trans-unit.target: 场景图支持一些日志类别。除了对 Qt 贡献者有帮助外,这些日志还可以用来追踪性能问题和错误。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph is a graphical representation of the Item scene, an independent structure that contains enough information to render all the items. Once it has been set up, it can be manipulated and rendered independently of the state of the items. On many platforms, the scene graph will even be rendered on a dedicated render thread while the GUI thread is preparing the next frame's state.
trans-unit.target: 场景图是Item场景的图形表示,是一个独立的结构,它包含了足够的信息来渲染所有的项目。一旦它被设置好,就可以独立于物品的状态进行操作和渲染。在许多平台上,当GUI线程在准备下一帧的状态时,场景图甚至会在一个专门的渲染线程上渲染。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph is a graphical representation of the Item scene. It can be thought of as a graphical deep copy, an independent structure that contains enough information to render all the items.
trans-unit.target: 场景图是Item场景的图形表示。它可以被认为是一个图形的深度拷贝,是一个独立的结构,包含了足够的信息来渲染所有的项目。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph is closely tied to Qt Quick 2.0 and can not be used stand-alone. The scene graph is managed and rendered by the QQuickWindow class and custom Item types can add their graphical primitives into the scene graph through a call to QQuickItem::updatePaintNode().
trans-unit.target: 场景图与Qt Quick 2.0紧密相关，不能单独使用。场景图由QQuickWindow类管理和呈现，自定义Item类型可以通过调用QQuickItem :: updatePaintNode（）将其图形基元添加到场景图中。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph is composed of a number of predefined node types, each serving a dedicated purpose. Although we refer to it as a scene graph, a more precise definition is node tree. The tree is built from QQuickItem types in the QML scene and internally the scene is then processed by a renderer which draws the scene. The nodes themselves do not contain any active drawing code nor virtual paint() function.
trans-unit.target: 场景图由许多预定义的节点类型组成，每种类型都有专门的用途。尽管我们将其称为场景图，但更精确的定义是节点树。该树是根据QML场景中的QQuickItem类型构建的，然后在内部对该场景进行渲染，以绘制该场景。节点本身不包含任何活动图形代码或虚拟 paint() 函数。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph is invalidated; This can happen, depending on the platform and QQuickWindow configuration, when the window is hidden using QQuickWindow::hide(), or when it is closed. If the item class implements a slot named invalidateSceneGraph(), this slot will be called on the rendering thread while the GUI thread is blocked. This is equivalent to connecting to QQuickWindow::sceneGraphInvalidated(). When rendering through OpenGL, the OpenGL context of this item's window will be bound when this slot is called. The only exception is if the native OpenGL has been destroyed outside Qt's control, for instance through EGL_CONTEXT_LOST.
trans-unit.target: 场景图无效；取决于平台和QQuickWindow配置，使用QQuickWindow :: hide（）隐藏窗口或关闭窗口时，可能会发生这种情况。如果该项目类实现一个 slot 命名 invalidateSceneGraph() ，这个槽会被渲染线程上，而GUI线程被阻塞调用。这等效于连接到QQuickWindow :: sceneGraphInvalidated（）。通过OpenGL渲染时，调用此插槽时将绑定此项目窗口的OpenGL上下文。唯一的例外是原生OpenGL是否已被Qt所控制，例如通过 EGL_CONTEXT_LOST 销毁了。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph is invalidated; This can happen, for instance, if the window is hidden using QQuickWindow::hide(). If the item class implements a slot named invalidateSceneGraph(), this slot will be called on the rendering thread while the GUI thread is blocked. This is equivalent to connecting to QQuickWindow::sceneGraphInvalidated(). The OpenGL context of this item's window will be bound when this slot is called. The only exception is if the native OpenGL has been destroyed outside Qt's control, for instance through EGL_CONTEXT_LOST.
trans-unit.target: 场景图无效；例如，如果使用QQuickWindow :: hide（）隐藏了窗口，则会发生这种情况。如果该项目类实现一个 slot 命名 invalidateSceneGraph() ，这个槽会被渲染线程上，而GUI线程被阻塞调用。这等效于连接到QQuickWindow :: sceneGraphInvalidated（）。调用此插槽时，将绑定此项目窗口的OpenGL上下文。唯一的例外是原生OpenGL是否已被Qt所控制，例如通过 EGL_CONTEXT_LOST 销毁了。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph is rendered:
trans-unit.target: 场景图已经呈现。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph nodes and resources are still released when the last QQuickWindow is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当删除最后一个QQuickWindow时，场景图节点和资源仍被释放。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph nodes and resources can be released to free up graphics resources when the window is obscured, hidden or not rendering. When this happens is implementation specific.
trans-unit.target: 当窗口被遮挡、隐藏或不渲染时,可以释放场景图节点和资源以释放图形资源。什么时候发生这种情况是特定的实现。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph nodes contains a mechanism to describe which parts of the scene has changed. This includes the combined matrices, accumulated opacity, changes to the node hierarchy, and so on. This information can be used for optimizations inside the scene graph renderer. For the renderer to properly render the nodes, it is important that users call QSGNode::markDirty() with the correct flags when nodes are changed. Most of the functions on the node classes will implicitly call markDirty(). For example, QSGNode::appendChildNode() will call markDirty() passing in QSGNode::DirtyNodeAdded.
trans-unit.target: 场景图节点包含一种机制，用于描述场景的哪些部分已更改。这包括组合的矩阵，累积的不透明度，对节点层次结构的更改等。此信息可用于场景图形渲染器内部的优化。为了使渲染器正确渲染节点，用户在更改节点时使用正确的标志调用QSGNode :: markDirty（）很重要。节点类上的大多数函数将隐式调用markDirty（）。例如，QSGNode :: appendChildNode（）将调用markDirty（）传递QSGNode :: DirtyNodeAdded。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph offers two methods for integrating OpenGL content: by calling OpenGL commands directly and by creating a textured node in the scene graph.
trans-unit.target: 场景图提供了两种集成OpenGL内容的方法:直接调用OpenGL命令和在场景图中创建一个纹理节点。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph offers two methods for integrating application-provided graphics commands: by issuing OpenGL, Vulkan, Metal, etc. commands directly, and by creating a textured node in the scene graph.
trans-unit.target: 场景图提供了两种集成应用程序提供的图形命令的方法:通过直接发出OpenGL、Vulkan、Metal等命令,以及在场景图中创建一个纹理节点。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph renderer in the D3D12 adaptation currently doesn't perform any batching. This is less of an issue, unlike OpenGL, because state changes don't present any problems in the first place. The simpler renderer logic can also lead to lower CPU overhead in some cases. The trade-offs between the various approaches are currently under research.
trans-unit.target: D3D12适配中的场景图渲染器目前没有进行任何批处理。这与OpenGL不同,问题较少,因为状态变化首先不会带来任何问题。简单的渲染器逻辑在某些情况下也会导致更低的CPU开销。各种方法之间的权衡目前还在研究中。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph supports two types of antialiasing. By default, primitives such as rectangles and images will be antialiased by adding more vertices along the edge of the primitives so that the edges fade to transparent. We call this method
trans-unit.target: 场景图支持两种类型的反锯齿。默认情况下,矩形和图像等基元将通过沿基元的边缘添加更多顶点进行反锯齿,使边缘褪色为透明。我们将此方法称为

trans-unit.source: The scene graph used for rendering in QtQuick 2 allows highly dynamic, animated user interfaces to be rendered fluidly at 60 FPS. There are some things which can dramatically decrease rendering performance, however, and developers should be careful to avoid these pitfalls wherever possible.
trans-unit.target: QtQuick 2中用于渲染的场景图允许以60 FPS流畅地渲染高度动态的动画用户界面。有些事情会大大降低渲染性能，但是，开发人员应注意避免这些陷阱。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph used for rendering in QtQuick 2 allows highly dynamic, animated user interfaces to be rendered fluidly at 60 FPS. There are some things which can dramatically decrease rendering performance, however, and developers should be careful to avoid these pitfalls wherever possible.
trans-unit.target: QtQuick 2中用于渲染的场景图允许以60 FPS流畅地渲染高度动态的动画用户界面。有些事情会大大降低渲染性能，但是，开发人员应小心避免这些陷阱。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph used for rendering in QtQuick 2 allows highly dynamic, animated user interfaces to be rendered fluidly at 60 FPS. There are some things which can dramatically decrease rendering performance, however, and developers should be careful to avoid these pitfalls wherever possible.
trans-unit.target: QtQuick 2中用于渲染的场景图允许以60 FPS流畅地渲染高度动态的动画用户界面。有些事情会大大降低渲染性能，但是，开发人员应小心避免这些陷阱。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph uses heuristics to figure out how large the atlas should be and what the size threshold for being entered into the atlas is. If different values are needed, it is possible to override them using the environment variables QSG_ATLAS_WIDTH=[width], QSG_ATLAS_HEIGHT=[height] and QSG_ATLAS_SIZE_LIMIT=[size]. Changing these values will mostly be interesting for platform vendors.
trans-unit.target: 场景图使用试探法来确定地图集应该多大以及输入地图集的大小阈值是多少。如果需要不同的值，则可以使用环境变量 QSG_ATLAS_WIDTH=[width] ， QSG_ATLAS_HEIGHT=[height] 和 QSG_ATLAS_SIZE_LIMIT=[size] 覆盖它们。对于平台供应商来说，更改这些值通常是很有趣的。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph uses the OpenGL context and will both rely on and clobber its state. When mixing raw OpenGL commands with scene graph rendering, this function provides a convenient way of resetting the OpenGL context state back to its default values.
trans-unit.target: 场景图使用OpenGL上下文,并且会依赖和破坏它的状态,当混合原始OpenGL命令和场景图渲染时,该函数提供了一种方便的方法,可以将OpenGL上下文状态重置为默认值。当混合原始OpenGL命令和场景图渲染时,该函数提供了一种将OpenGL上下文状态重置为默认值的便捷方法。

trans-unit.source: The scene graph will often try to find materials that have the same or at least similar state so that these can be batched together inside the renderer, which gives better performance. To specify sortable material states, use QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_COMPARABLE_SHADER instead of QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER. The state struct must then also define the function:
trans-unit.target: 场景图通常会尝试查找状态相同或至少相似的材质，以便可以在渲染器中将这些材质批处理在一起，从而提供更好的性能。要指定可排序的物料状态，请使用QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_COMPARABLE_SHADER而不是QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER。然后，状态struct还必须定义函数：

trans-unit.source: The scene is cleared to be transparent. This is useful to render 3D content on top of another item.
trans-unit.target: 场景被清除为透明。这对于在另一个项目上渲染3D内容很有用。

trans-unit.source: The scene is cleared to be transparent. This is useful to render 3D content on top of another item. This mode has no effect when the View3D is using a renderMode of Underlay or Overlay.
trans-unit.target: 场景被清除为透明。在将3D内容渲染到另一个项目的顶部时，这很有用。当View3D使用Underlay或Overlay的renderMode时，此模式无效。

trans-unit.source: The scene is cleared with the color specified by the clearColor property.
trans-unit.target: 使用clearColor属性指定的颜色清除场景。

trans-unit.source: The scene is cleared with the color specified by the clearColor property. This mode has no effect when the View3D is using a renderMode of Underlay or Overlay.
trans-unit.target: 使用clearColor属性指定的颜色清除场景。当View3D使用Underlay或Overlay的renderMode时，此模式无效。

trans-unit.source: The scene is rendered directly to the window after Qt Quick is rendered. With this mode, the View3D will always be on top of other Qt Quick items.
trans-unit.target: 渲染Qt Quick后，场景将直接渲染到窗口中。在此模式下，View3D将始终位于其他Qt Quick项目的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The scene is rendered directly to the window before the rest of the Qt Quick scene is rendered. With this mode, the View3D cannot be placed on top of other Qt Quick items.
trans-unit.target: 在其余Qt Quick场景被渲染之前，场景将直接渲染到窗口。在此模式下，View3D不能放置在其他Qt Quick项目的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The scene is rendered in a higher resolution, and then scaled down to actual resolution.
trans-unit.target: 场景以较高的分辨率渲染,然后缩小到实际分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The scene is rendered into an off-screen buffer as an intermediate step. This off-screen buffer is then composited with the rest of the Qt Quick scene.
trans-unit.target: 作为中间步骤,场景被渲染到一个离屏缓冲区。然后,这个离屏缓冲区将与Qt Quick场景的其余部分进行合成。

trans-unit.source: The scene manager in Qt Quick 3D is responsible for keeping track of spatial items in a 3D scene, and for making sure that items are updating their corresponding scene graph nodes during the synchronize phase. In Qt Quick, this role is performed by QQuickWindow for the 2D case. The scene manager is the primary interface between the frontend nodes and the backend scene graph objects.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick 3D中的场景管理器负责跟踪3D场景中的空间项目，并确保项目在同步阶段正在更新其对应的场景图节点。在Qt Quick中，此角色由QQuickWindow在2D情况下执行。场景管理器是前端节点和后端场景图对象之间的主要接口。

trans-unit.source: The scene point at the center of the view is used as the anchor.
trans-unit.target: 视图中心的场景点被用作锚点。

trans-unit.source: The scene position is the position in QGraphicsScene coordinates if the QTouchEvent is handled by a QGraphicsItem::touchEvent() reimplementation, and identical to the screen position for widgets.
trans-unit.target: 如果QTouchEvent由QGraphicsItem :: touchEvent（）重新实现处理，则场景位置是QGraphicsScene坐标中的位置，并且与小部件的屏幕位置相同。

trans-unit.source: The scene position is the position relative to QQuickWindow if handled in QQuickItem::event(), in QGraphicsScene coordinates if handled by an override of QGraphicsItem::touchEvent(), or the window position in widget applications.
trans-unit.target: 如果在QQuickItem :: event（）中处理，则场景位置是相对于QQuickWindow的位置；在QGraphicsScene坐标中，如果通过重写QGraphicsItem :: touchEvent（）处理，则场景位置是相对于QQuickWindow的位置，或者是窗口小部件应用程序中的窗口位置。

trans-unit.source: The scene rectangle defines the extent of the scene, and in the view's case, this means the area of the scene that you can navigate using the scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 场景矩形定义了场景的范围,在视图中,这意味着你可以使用滚动条导航的场景区域。

trans-unit.source: The scene rectangle defines the extent of the scene. It is primarily used by QGraphicsView to determine the view's default scrollable area, and by QGraphicsScene to manage item indexing.
trans-unit.target: 场景矩形定义场景的范围。它主要使用的QGraphicsView确定视图的默认滚动区域，并通过QGraphicsScene来管理项目索引。

trans-unit.source: The scene represents the base coordinate system for all its items. The scene coordinate system describes the position of each top-level item, and also forms the basis for all scene events delivered to the scene from the view. Each item on the scene has a scene position and bounding rectangle (QGraphicsItem::scenePos(), QGraphicsItem::sceneBoundingRect()), in addition to its local item pos and bounding rectangle. The scene position describes the item's position in scene coordinates, and its scene bounding rect forms the basis for how QGraphicsScene determines what areas of the scene have changed. Changes in the scene are communicated through the QGraphicsScene::changed() signal, and the argument is a list of scene rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 场景代表所有项目的基本坐标系。场景坐标系描述了每个顶级项目的位置，并且还构成了从视图传递到场景的所有场景事件的基础。场景中的每个项目除了其本地项目pos和边界矩形之外，还具有场景位置和边界矩形（QGraphicsItem :: scenePos（），QGraphicsItem :: sceneBoundingRect（））。场景位置描述了项目在场景坐标中的位置，其场景边界矩形构成了QGraphicsScene如何确定场景的哪些区域已更改的基础。场景中的更改通过QGraphicsScene :: changed（）信号传达，并且参数是场景矩形的列表。

trans-unit.source: The scene sends the event to the first QGraphicsItem under the mouse cursor that accepts drops; a graphics item is set to accept drops with setAcceptDrops().
trans-unit.target: 场景将事件发送到接受拖放的鼠标光标下的第一个QGraphicsItem；通过setAcceptDrops（）将图形项设置为接受墨滴。

trans-unit.source: The scene serves as a container for QGraphicsItem objects. Items are added to the scene by calling QGraphicsScene::addItem(), and then retrieved by calling one of the many item discovery functions. QGraphicsScene::items() and its overloads return all items contained by or intersecting with a point, a rectangle, a polygon or a general vector path. QGraphicsScene::itemAt() returns the topmost item at a particular point. All item discovery functions return the items in descending stacking order (i.e., the first returned item is topmost, and the last item is bottom-most).
trans-unit.target: 该场景用作QGraphicsItem对象的容器。通过调用QGraphicsScene :: addItem（）将项目添加到场景中，然后通过调用许多项目发现函数之一来检索项目。QGraphicsScene :: items（）及其重载返回由点，矩形，多边形或常规矢量路径包含或与之相交的所有项目。QGraphicsScene :: itemAt（）返回特定点上的最高项目。所有项目发现功能都以降序堆叠的方式返回项目（即，第一个返回的项目是最顶部，而最后一个项目是最底部）。

trans-unit.source: The scene will not be cleared, but instead a Skybox or Skydome will be rendered. The Skybox is defined using the HDRI map defined in the lightProbe property.
trans-unit.target: 不会清除场景，但是将渲染Skybox或Skydome。Skybox是使用lightProbe属性中定义的HDRI映射定义的。

trans-unit.source: The scene's bounding rect is set by calling setSceneRect(). Items can be placed at any position on the scene, and the size of the scene is by default unlimited. The scene rect is used only for internal bookkeeping, maintaining the scene's item index. If the scene rect is unset, QGraphicsScene will use the bounding area of all items, as returned by itemsBoundingRect(), as the scene rect. However, itemsBoundingRect() is a relatively time consuming function, as it operates by collecting positional information for every item on the scene. Because of this, you should always set the scene rect when operating on large scenes.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用setSceneRect（）设置场景的边界矩形。可以将项目放置在场景中的任何位置，默认情况下，场景的大小不受限制。场景rect仅用于内部簿记，维护场景的项目索引。如果未设置场景矩形，则QGraphicsScene将使用itemsBoundingRect（）返回的所有项目的边界区域作为场景矩形。但是，itemsBoundingRect（）是一个相对耗时的函数，因为它通过收集场景中每个项目的位置信息进行操作。因此，在大型场景上操作时，应始终将场景设置为rect。

trans-unit.source: The scene's bounding rect is set by calling setSceneRect(). Items can be placed at any position on the scene, and the size of the scene is by default unlimited. The scene rect is used only for internal bookkeeping, maintaining the scene's item index. If the scene rect is unset, QGraphicsScene will use the bounding area of all items, as returned by itemsBoundingRect(), as the scene rect. However, itemsBoundingRect() is a relatively time consuming function, as it operates by collecting positional information for every item on the scene. Because of this, you should always set the scene rect when operating on large scenes.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用setSceneRect（）设置场景的边界矩形。可以将项目放置在场景中的任何位置，默认情况下，场景的大小不受限制。场景rect仅用于内部簿记，维护场景的项目索引。如果未设置场景矩形，则QGraphicsScene将使用itemsBoundingRect（）返回的所有项目的边界区域作为场景矩形。但是，itemsBoundingRect（）是一个相对耗时的函数，因为它通过收集场景中每个项目的位置信息来进行操作。因此，在大型场景上操作时，应始终将场景设置为rect。

trans-unit.source: The scheme can also be empty, in which case the URL is interpreted as relative.
trans-unit.target: 该方案也可以是空的,在这种情况下,URL被解释为相对的。

trans-unit.source: The scheme can only contain US-ASCII letters or digits, which means it cannot contain any character that would otherwise require encoding. Additionally, schemes are always returned in lowercase form.
trans-unit.target: 方案只能包含US-ASCII字母或数字,这意味着它不能包含任何需要编码的字符。此外,方案总是以小写形式返回。

trans-unit.source: The scheme describes the type (or protocol) of the URL. It's represented by one or more ASCII characters at the start the URL.
trans-unit.target: 该方案描述了URL的类型(或协议)。它由URL开头的一个或多个ASCII字符表示。

trans-unit.source: The scheme is removed from the URL.
trans-unit.target: 该方案从URL中删除。

trans-unit.source: The scope for customizing the painting behavior of standard Qt widgets, without resorting to subclassing, is slightly less than that possible for custom widgets. Usually, the desired appearance of a standard widget can be achieved by setting its autoFillBackground property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义标准Qt小部件的绘画行为的范围（不求助于子类）比自定义小部件的范围小。通常，可以通过设置标准窗口小部件的autoFillBackground属性来获得所需的外观。

trans-unit.source: The scope in the above snippet modifies the build target in each mode to ensure that the resulting targets have different names. Providing different names for targets ensures that one will not overwrite the other.
trans-unit.target: 上述代码段中的作用域修改了每个模式中的构建目标,以确保生成的目标具有不同的名称。为目标提供不同的名称可确保一个目标不会覆盖另一个目标。

trans-unit.source: The scope is QSettings::UserScope and the format is defaultFormat() (QSettings::NativeFormat by default). Use setDefaultFormat() before calling this constructor to change the default format used by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 范围是QSettings :: UserScope，格式是defaultFormat（）（默认情况下是QSettings :: NativeFormat）。在调用此构造函数之前，请使用setDefaultFormat（）来更改此构造函数使用的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: The scope is set to QSettings::UserScope, and the format is set to QSettings::NativeFormat (i.e. calling setDefaultFormat() before calling this constructor has no effect).
trans-unit.target: 范围设置为QSettings :: UserScope，格式设置为QSettings :: NativeFormat（即在调用此构造函数之前调用setDefaultFormat（）无效）。

trans-unit.source: The screen is inherited from the parent.
trans-unit.target: 画面是由父体继承的。

trans-unit.source: The screen orientation represents the physical orientation of the display. For example, the screen orientation of a mobile device will change based on how it is being held. A change to the orientation might or might not trigger a change to the primary orientation of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕方向代表显示器的物理方向。例如,移动设备的屏幕方向将根据其被握持的方式而改变。方向的改变可能会也可能不会触发屏幕主方向的改变。

trans-unit.source: The screen with which the window is associated.
trans-unit.target: 窗口所关联的画面。

trans-unit.source: The screen-occupation state of the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的占屏状态。

trans-unit.source: The screens orientation has changes (QScreenOrientationChangeEvent).
trans-unit.target: 屏幕方向已更改（QScreenOrientationChangeEvent）。

trans-unit.target: 下面的截图显示了一个使用网格设计的基本用户界面的分解。截图上的坐标显示的是网格中每个小部件的位置。

trans-unit.target: 左边显示的截图平原与QSqlTableModel在QTableView中。外键（ city 和 country ）未解析为人类可读的值。右边的屏幕截图显示了QSqlRelationalTableModel，其中外键解析为人类可读的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The screenshot on the left shows a plain QSqlTableModel in a QTableView. Foreign keys (city and country) aren't resolved to human-readable values. The screenshot on the right shows a QSqlRelationalTableModel, with foreign keys resolved into human-readable text strings.

trans-unit.target: 脚本可以执行代码,并被连接起来,这样它就可以处理事件。

trans-unit.source: The script code will be evaluated in the context of the global object.
trans-unit.target: 脚本代码将在全局对象的上下文中进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The script engine used is determined from the file's extension. By default ".js" files are interpreted as JScript files, and ".vbs" and ".dsm" files are interpreted as VBScript. Additional script engines can be registered using registerEngine().
trans-unit.target: 使用的脚本引擎由文件扩展名确定。默认情况下，“。js”文件解释为JScript文件，“。vbs”和“ .dsm”文件解释为VBScript。可以使用registerEngine（）注册其他脚本引擎。

trans-unit.source: The script engine will be used when loading files with the given
trans-unit.target: 脚本引擎将在加载文件时使用给定的

trans-unit.target: 脚本已经创建,但还没有初始化。

trans-unit.source: The script provides scriptEngine() provides feedback to the application through signals. The most important signal is the error() signal. Direct access to the QAxScriptEngine is provided through the scriptEngine() function.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本提供了scriptEngine（）通过信号向应用程序提供反馈。最重要的信号是error（）信号。通过scriptEngine（）函数可以直接访问QAxScriptEngine。

trans-unit.source: The script will be executed as soon as the document is created. This is not suitable for any DOM operation.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本将在文档创建后立即执行。这不适合任何DOM操作。

trans-unit.source: The script will run as soon as the DOM is ready. This is equivalent to the DOMContentLoaded event firing in JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: DOM准备就绪后，脚本将立即运行。这等效于JavaScript中的 DOMContentLoaded 事件触发。

trans-unit.source: The scroll bars and viewport should be updated whenever the viewport receives a resize event or the size of the contents changes. The viewport also needs to be updated when the scroll bars values change. The initial values of the scroll bars are often set when the area receives new contents.
trans-unit.target: 每当视口接收到一个调整大小的事件或者内容的大小发生变化时,滚动条和视口都应该被更新。当滚动条的值发生变化时,视口也需要更新。滚动条的初始值通常是在区域收到新内容时设置的。

trans-unit.source: The scroll bars appearance depends on the currently set scroll bar policies. You can control the appearance of the scroll bars using the inherited functionality from QAbstractScrollArea.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条的外观取决于当前设置的滚动条策略。您可以使用QAbstractScrollArea继承的功能来控制滚动条的外观。

trans-unit.source: The scroll event is sent to indicate that the receiver should be scrolled. Usually the receiver should be something visual like QWidget or QGraphicsObject.
trans-unit.target: 发送滚动事件以指示应该滚动接收器。通常，接收器应该是类似QWidget或QGraphicsObject的视觉对象。

trans-unit.source: The scroll event is sent to indicate that the receiver should be scrolled. Usually the receiver should be something visual like QWidget or QGraphicsObject.

trans-unit.source: The scroll prepare event is sent before scrolling (usually by QScroller) is started. The object receiving this event should set viewportSize, maxContentPos and contentPos. It also should accept this event to indicate that scrolling should be started.
trans-unit.target: 在开始滚动之前（通常通过QScroller），发送了滚动准备事件。接收此事件的对象应设置viewportSize，maxContentPos和contentPos。它还应接受此事件，以指示应开始滚动。

trans-unit.source: The search context is used by backends to store additional search context related to the search request. Other relevant fields should also be filled in. For example, if the search context encodes a text search the search term should also be set with setSearchTerm(). The search context allows additional search context to be kept which is not directly accessible via the Qt Location API.

trans-unit.source: The second case is explained by example. Suppose you want to populate a list widget with the values of certain attributes from a set of result elements. You could write an XQuery to return the set of elements, and then you would write the code to iterate over the result elements, get their attributes, and extract the desired string values. But the simpler way is to just augment your XQuery to finding the desired attribute values. Then all you have to do is evaluate the XQuery using the version of QXmlQuery::evaluateTo() that populates a QStringList, which you can send directly to your widget.
trans-unit.target: 通过示例说明第二种情况。假设您要使用一组结果元素中某些属性的值填充列表窗口小部件。您可以编写一个XQuery返回元素集，然后编写代码以遍历结果元素，获取它们的属性并提取所需的字符串值。但是，更简单的方法是仅扩展XQuery来查找所需的属性值。然后，所有你需要做的是评估的XQuery使用的版本QXmlQuery :: evaluateTo用于填充一）（QStringList中，您可以直接发送到你的widget。

trans-unit.source: The second is optional and is a map of property-value pairs that define initial any property values for the object. trans-unit.source: The second is that QPlaceManager::compatiblePlace() of the destination manager use the x_provider attribute of the initial place and set an alternative identifier attribute of the place to be saved. The x_provider attribute should not be passed to the compatible place. When it is saved, the x_provider of the saved place is considered to be the destination manager.

trans-unit.source: The selection model emits signals to indicate changes in the selection. These notify other components about changes to both the selection as a whole and the currently focused item in the item model. We can connect the selectionChanged() signal to a slot, and examine the items in the model that are selected or deselected when the selection changes. The slot is called with two QItemSelection objects: one contains a list of indexes that correspond to newly selected items; the other contains indexes that correspond to newly deselected items.
trans-unit.target: 选择模型发出信号以指示选择的变化。这些通知其他组件有关整个选择以及项目模型中当前关注的项目的更改。我们可以将selectionChanged（）信号连接到插槽，并检查选择更改时模型中已选择或取消选择的项目。该插槽用两个QItemSelection对象调用：一个包含与新选择的项目相对应的索引列表；另一个包含一个与新选择的项目相对应的索引列表。另一个包含与新取消选择的项目相对应的索引。

trans-unit.source: The selection model used in the item view classes provides a general description of selections based on the facilities of the model/view architecture. Although the standard classes for manipulating selections are sufficient for the item views provided, the selection model allows you to create specialized selection models to suit the requirements for your own item models and views.
trans-unit.target: 项目视图类中使用的选择模型根据模型/视图架构的设施提供了对选择的一般描述。虽然用于操作选择的标准类对所提供的项目视图来说已经足够,但选择模型允许您创建专门的选择模型,以适应您自己的项目模型和视图的要求。

trans-unit.source: The selection of items can be modified using various operations that are defined by the selection flags. The selection that results from these operations may have a complex structure, but it is represented efficiently by the selection model. The use of different selection flags to manipulate the selected items is described when we examine how to update a selection.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用由选择标志定义的各种操作来修改项目的选择。这些操作所产生的选择可能有一个复杂的结构,但它被选择模型有效地表示出来。当我们研究如何更新选择时,将介绍使用不同的选择标志来操作所选项目。

trans-unit.source: The sender object which is associated with this signal transition.

trans-unit.source: The sensor data is delivered via QSensorReading and its sub-classes.
trans-unit.target: 传感器数据通过QSensorReading及其子类传递。

trans-unit.source: The sensor does not take ownership of the filter. QSensorFilter will inform the sensor if it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 传感器不拥有过滤器的所有权。QSensorFilter会通知传感器是否被破坏。

trans-unit.source: The sensor may fail to start for several reasons.
trans-unit.target: 该传感器可能因多种原因而无法启动。

trans-unit.source: The sensor reading can be found in the QSensor::reading property. Note that the reading object is a volatile cache of the most recent sensor reading that has been received so the application should process the reading immediately or save the values somewhere for later processing.
trans-unit.target: 传感器的读数可以在QSensor :: reading属性中找到。请注意，读取对象是已接收到的最新传感器读数的易失性缓存，因此应用程序应立即处理该读数或将值保存在某处以供以后处理。

trans-unit.source: The sensor reports reflectance as a decimal fraction in the range of 0 - 1. That is, 0 indicates nothing was detected within the range of the sensor and 1 indicates the infra-red signal returned at the full power level that it was sent at.
trans-unit.target: 传感器将反射率报告为0-1范围内的小数点,也就是说,0表示在传感器范围内没有检测到任何东西,1表示红外信号以其发送的全部功率水平返回。

trans-unit.source: The sensor type.
trans-unit.target: 传感器类型;

trans-unit.source: The separation of content and presentation is achieved by the use of a standard model interface provided by QAbstractItemModel, a standard view interface provided by QAbstractItemView, and the use of model indexes that represent items of data in a general way. Views typically manage the overall layout of the data obtained from models. They may render individual items of data themselves, or use delegates to handle both rendering and editing features.
trans-unit.target: 的内容和表示该分离是通过使用所提供的一种标准模型接口的实现化QAbstractItemModel，所提供的标准视图interface QAbstractItemView中，以及使用表示在一般的方式数据项模型索引。视图通常管理从模型获得的数据的整体布局。他们可以自己渲染单个数据项，或使用委托来处理渲染和编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: The separation of content and presentation is achieved by the use of a standard model interface provided by QAbstractItemModel, a standard view interface provided by QAbstractItemView, and the use of model indexes that represent items of data in a general way. Views typically manage the overall layout of the data obtained from models. They may render individual items of data themselves, or use delegates to handle both rendering and editing features.
trans-unit.target: 的内容和表示该分离是通过使用所提供的一种标准模型接口的实现化QAbstractItemModel，所提供的标准视图interface QAbstractItemView中，以及使用表示在一般的方式数据项模型索引。视图通常管理从模型获得的数据的整体布局。他们可以自己渲染单个数据项，或使用委托来处理渲染和编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: The separation of functionality between the model/view components allows models to be created that can take advantage of existing views. This approach lets us present data from a variety of sources using standard graphical user interface components, such as QListView, QTableView, and QTreeView.
trans-unit.target: 模型/视图组件之间的功能分离允许创建可以利用现有视图的模型。这种方法使我们能够使用标准的图形用户界面组件（例如QListView，QTableView和QTreeView）从各种来源显示数据。

trans-unit.source: The series
trans-unit.target: 该系列

trans-unit.source: The series assumes ownership of any proxy set to it and deletes any previously set proxy when a new one is added. The proxy cannot be null or set to another series.
trans-unit.target: 该系列假设对其设置的任何代理的所有权,并在添加新的代理时删除之前设置的任何代理。该代理不能为空,也不能设置为其他系列。

trans-unit.source: The series keeps track of the sum of all the slices it holds.
trans-unit.target: 该系列记录了它所拥有的所有切片的总和。

trans-unit.source: The series name can be used in item label format with the tag @seriesName.
trans-unit.target: 系列名称可以使用带有标签 @seriesName 的项目标签格式使用。

trans-unit.source: The series name. It can be used in item label format with the tag @seriesName.
trans-unit.target: 系列名称。可以使用标签 @seriesName 以项目标签格式使用。

trans-unit.source: The series of the graph. By default, this property contains an empty list. To set the series, either use the addSeries() function or define them as children of the graph.
trans-unit.target: 图的系列。默认情况下，此属性包含一个空列表。要设置系列，请使用addSeries（）函数或将它们定义为图的子级。

trans-unit.source: The series that is used by the mapper. All the data in the series is discarded when it is set to the mapper. When a new series is specified, the old series is disconnected (but it preserves its data).
trans-unit.target: 映射器使用的系列。当它被设置为映射器时,该系列中的所有数据都被丢弃。当指定一个新的系列时,旧的系列会被断开(但它会保留其数据)。

trans-unit.source: The series this proxy is attached to.
trans-unit.target: 本委托书所隶属的系列。

trans-unit.source: The server answered the request with an error.
trans-unit.target: 服务器回答请求时出现了错误。

trans-unit.source: The server can create multiple instances of each exported class. This is the default. All instances will live in the same thread, and will share static resources.
trans-unit.target: 服务器可以为每个导出的类创建多个实例。这是默认的。所有的实例将生活在同一个线程中,并共享静态资源。

trans-unit.source: The server cannot perform the program function received in the query. This code is returned for an unsuccessful programming request. The client should request diagnostic or error information from the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器无法执行查询中接收到的程序功能。此代码为不成功的编程请求返回。客户端应向服务器请求诊断或错误信息。

trans-unit.source: The server did not authorize access to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 服务器没有授权访问该资源。

trans-unit.source: The server does not export an implementation of a QAxFactory. Use the QAXFACTORY_EXPORT() macro in one of the project's implementation files to instantiate and export a factory, or use the QAXCLASS() or QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT() macro to use the default factory.
trans-unit.target: 服务器不导出QAxFactory的实现。使用项目的实现文件之一中的QAXFACTORY_EXPORT（）宏实例化和导出工厂，或者使用QAXCLASS（）或QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT（）宏使用默认工厂。

trans-unit.source: The server does not export an implementation of a QAxFactory. Use the QAXFACTORY_EXPORT() macro in one of the project's implementation files to instantiate and export a factory, or use the QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT() macro to use the default factory.
trans-unit.target: 服务器不导出QAxFactory的实现。使用项目的实现文件之一中的QAXFACTORY_EXPORT（）宏实例化和导出工厂，或者使用QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT（）宏使用默认工厂。

trans-unit.source: The server does not have the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 服务器没有请求的数据。

trans-unit.source: The server exports more than one implementation of a QAxFactory, or exports the same implementation twice. If you use the default factory, the QAXFACTORY_BEGIN() or QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT() macro must only be used once in the project. Use a custom QAxFactory implementation and the QAXFACTORY_EXPORT() macro if the server provides multiple ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: 服务器导出一个QAxFactory的多个实现，或者导出相同的实现两次。如果使用默认工厂，则QAXFACTORY_BEGIN（）或QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT（）宏只能在项目中使用一次。如果服务器提供了多个ActiveX控件，请使用自定义QAxFactory实现和QAXFACTORY_EXPORT（）宏。

trans-unit.source: The server exports more than one implementation of a QAxFactory, or exports the same implementation twice. If you use the default factory, the QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT() macro must only be used once in the project. Use a custom QAxFactory implementation and the QAXFACTORY_EXPORT() macro if the server provides multiple ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: 服务器导出一个QAxFactory的多个实现，或者导出相同的实现两次。如果使用默认工厂，则QAXFACTORY_DEFAULT（）宏只能在项目中使用一次。如果服务器提供多个ActiveX控件，请使用自定义QAxFactory实现和QAXFACTORY_EXPORT（）宏。

trans-unit.source: The server has gone down.
trans-unit.target: 服务器出现了故障。

trans-unit.target: 服务器是自动启动的,使用

trans-unit.source: The server operates in non-secure mode (over ws)
trans-unit.target: 服务器在非安全模式下运行(通过ws)。

trans-unit.source: The server operates in secure mode (over wss)
trans-unit.target: 服务器在安全模式下运行(通过wss)。

trans-unit.source: The server process can create only one instance of each exported class. COM starts a new process for each request. This is typically used in servers that export only one creatable class.
trans-unit.target: 服务器进程只能创建每个导出类的一个实例。COM为每个请求启动一个新的进程。这通常用于只导出一个可创建类的服务器中。

trans-unit.source: The server push. Allows to enable or disable server push. Sent as 'SETTINGS_ENABLE_PUSH' parameter in the initial 'SETTINGS' frame.
trans-unit.target: 服务器推送。允许启用或禁用服务器推送。在初始'SETTINGS'框架中作为'SETTINGS_ENABLE_PUSH'参数发送。

trans-unit.source: The server's response to a token request provided no token identifier.
trans-unit.target: 服务器对令牌请求的响应没有提供令牌标识。

trans-unit.source: The server's response to a token request provided no token secret.
trans-unit.target: 服务器对令牌请求的响应没有提供令牌秘密。

trans-unit.source: The service being bound is an isolated, external service. See BIND_EXTERNAL_SERVICE documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 绑定的服务是隔离的外部服务。有关更多详细信息，请参见BIND_EXTERNAL_SERVICE文档。

trans-unit.source: The service could not allocate resources required to function correctly.
trans-unit.target: 该服务无法分配正常运行所需的资源。

trans-unit.source: The service details are being discovered.
trans-unit.target: 正在发现服务细节。

trans-unit.source: The service details are yet to be discovered by calling discoverDetails(). The only reliable pieces of information are its serviceUuid() and serviceName().
trans-unit.target: 尚未通过调用discoverDetails（）发现服务详细信息。唯一可靠的信息是其serviceUuid（）和serviceName（）。

trans-unit.source: The service details have been discovered.
trans-unit.target: 发现服务细节。

trans-unit.source: The service discovery may find Bluetooth Low Energy services too if the target device is a combination of a classic and Low Energy device. Those devices are required to advertise their Low Energy services via SDP. If the target device only supports Bluetooth Low Energy services, it is likely to not advertise them via SDP. The QLowEnergyController class should be utilized to perform the service discovery on Low Energy devices.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标设备是传统设备和低功耗设备的组合，则服务发现也可能会找到蓝牙低功耗服务。这些设备需要通过SDP宣传其低能耗服务。如果目标设备仅支持低功耗蓝牙服务，则很可能不会通过SDP通告它们。该QLowEnergyController类应该被用于执行对低功耗设备的服务发现。

trans-unit.source: The service does not require any security.
trans-unit.target: 该服务不需要任何安全保障。

trans-unit.source: The service is a primary service.
trans-unit.target: 该服务是一种初级服务。

trans-unit.source: The service is a secondary service. Secondary services are included by other services to implement some higher-level functionality.
trans-unit.target: 该服务是一个二级服务。二级服务被其他服务所包含,以实现一些更高级别的功能。

trans-unit.source: The service is a top-level/primary service. If this type flag is not set, the service is considered to be a secondary service. Each service may be included by another service which is indicated by IncludedService.
trans-unit.target: 该服务是顶层/主要服务,如果不设置该类型标志,则认为该服务是次要服务。如果没有设置该类型标志,则该服务被认为是二级服务。每个服务都可以被另一个服务所包含,这个服务由 IncludedService 表示。

trans-unit.source: The service is associated with a controller object in the peripheral role. Such service objects do not change their state. This value was introduced by Qt 5.7.
trans-unit.target: 该服务与外围角色中的控制器对象相关联。此类服务对象不会更改其状态。此值由Qt 5.7引入。

trans-unit.source: The service is included by another service. On some platforms, this flag cannot be determined until the service that includes the current service was discovered.
trans-unit.target: 该服务被另一个服务所包含。在某些平台上,在发现包含当前服务的服务之前,无法确定该标志。

trans-unit.source: The service is not ready for capture yet.

trans-unit.source: The service is the preferred provider of a service.

trans-unit.source: The session manager is used to save the session, e.g., when the machine is shut down, and to restore a session, e.g., when the machine is started up. We recommend that you use QSettings to save an application's settings, for example, window positions, recently used files, etc. When the application is restarted by the session manager, you can restore the settings.

trans-unit.source: The shader hasn't been compiled and linked yet
trans-unit.target: 该着色器还没有被编译和链接。

trans-unit.target: 该着色器是一个计算型着色器

trans-unit.source: The shader is a fragment shader
trans-unit.target: 该着色器是一个片段着色器

trans-unit.source: The shader is a fragment shader. After vertex processing, the modified geometry is turned into fragments (rasterization). Then a fragment shader is executed for each fragment, assigning a color to it. Fragments are a related concept to pixels, but with additional information attached. Also, as a result of some anti-aliasing strategies, there may be more than one fragment for each pixel in the output.
trans-unit.target: 该着色器是一个片段着色器。经过顶点处理后,修改后的几何体被转化为碎片(光栅化)。然后为每个片段执行一个片段着色器,为其分配一种颜色。片段是一个与像素相关的概念,但附加了额外的信息。此外,由于一些抗锯齿策略,在输出中每个像素可能有多个片段。

trans-unit.source: The shader is a geometry shader
trans-unit.target: 该着色器是一个几何着色器

trans-unit.source: The shader is a vertex shader
trans-unit.target: 该着色器是一个顶点着色器

trans-unit.source: The shader is a vertex shader. This code is run once per vertex in the input geometry and can be used to modify it before the geometry is rasterized (scan converted). In the case of effects, the input geometry is always a quad (four vertexes representing the corners of the render target).
trans-unit.target: 该着色器是一个顶点着色器。这段代码在输入几何体的每个顶点运行一次,可以在几何体栅格化(扫描转换)之前对其进行修改。在特效的情况下,输入的几何体总是一个四边形(四个顶点代表渲染目标的角)。

trans-unit.source: The shader is default glossy. This is a combination of ShaderInfo.Diffuse and ShaderInfo.Specular.
trans-unit.target: 着色器为默认光泽。这是 ShaderInfo.Diffuse 和 ShaderInfo.Specular 的组合。

trans-unit.source: The shader pipeline is based on the standard approach of Qt 6: Vulkan-compatible GLSL shader code is compiled to SPIR-V, which is then translated to GLSL, HLSL, and MSL source code. Refer to the Qt Shader Tools module documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 着色器管道基于Qt 6的标准方法：将Vulkan兼容的GLSL着色器代码编译为SPIR-V，然后将其转换为GLSL，HLSL和MSL源代码。有关详细信息，请参考Qt Shader Tools模块文档。

trans-unit.source: The shader pipeline state changes are less often used. One use case is materials that wish to use a specific blend mode. The relevant function is updateGraphicsPipelineState(). This function is not called unless the QSGMaterialShader has opted in by setting the flag UpdatesGraphicsPipelineState. The task of the function is to update the GraphicsPipelineState struct instance that is passed to it with the desired changes. Currently only blending and culling-related features are available, other states cannot be controlled by materials.
trans-unit.target: 着色器管道状态更改不经常使用。一种用例是希望使用特定混合模式的材料。相关功能是updateGraphicsPipelineState（）。除非QSGMaterialShader通过设置标志UpdatesGraphicsPipelineState选择启用，否则不会调用此函数。该函数的任务是使用所需的更改来更新传递给它的GraphicsPipelineState结构实例。当前仅提供与混合和剔除相关的功能，其他状态无法由材质控制。

trans-unit.source: The shadergen tool is a command line application that is part of Qt Quick 3D's asset conditioning pipeline. It can be enable per project or run manually from the command line. Pre-generating the material shaders can have a significant impact on the start-up time and/or avoid unwanted stalls at run-time, as the processes of creating a material shader at run-time can be costly.
trans-unit.target: shadergen工具是一个命令行应用程序,是Qt Quick 3D的资产调节管道的一部分。它可以在每个项目中启用,也可以在命令行中手动运行。预先生成材质着色器可以对启动时间产生重大影响,并且/或者避免在运行时出现不必要的停顿,因为在运行时创建材质着色器的过程可能成本很高。

trans-unit.source: The shadergen tools main output file is a .qsbc file. The .qsbc file contains a collection of .qsb files plus some meta-data about the various material shaders, like the unique property string for each material.
trans-unit.target: shadergen工具的主要输出文件是.qsbc文件。该.qsbc文件中包含的集合.qsb文件以及有关各种材质着色器，如独特的属性字符串每种材料的一些元数据。

trans-unit.source: The shaders set by calling the protected setShaderFileName() function control what material does with the vertex data from the geometry, and how the fragments are shaded. A QSGMaterialShader will typically set a vertex and a fragment shader during construction. Changing the shaders afterwards may not lead to the desired effect and must be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用受保护的setShaderFileName（）函数设置的着色器可以控制材质对几何图形中的顶点数据的作用以及如何对片段进行着色。QSGMaterialShader通常会在构造过程中设置一个顶点和一个片段着色器。此后更改着色器可能无法获得理想的效果，因此必须避免。

trans-unit.source: The shape is determined by calling QPixmap::mask(). This shape includes only the opaque pixels of the pixmap. Because the shape is more complex, however, it can be slower than the other modes, and uses more memory.

trans-unit.source: The signal handlers should handle the incoming transaction. Once the transaction has been handled appropriately, it should be finalized. For instance, when a purchase has succeeded, it's appropriate to save information about the purchased product in persistent storage, so that this product can still be available the next time the application launches.
trans-unit.target: 信号处理人员应处理进入的交易。一旦事务处理得当,就应该对其进行最终处理。例如,当购买成功后,应该将购买的产品信息保存在持久性存储中,这样在下次启动应用程序时,这个产品仍然可以使用。

trans-unit.source: The signal is emitted after both widget have been notified about the change through QFocusEvent.
trans-unit.target: 通过QFocusEvent通知两个小部件更改后，将发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The signal is emitted after scene graph has added its commands to the command buffer, which is not yet submitted to the graphics queue. If desired, the slot function connected to this signal can query native resources, like the command buffer, before via QSGRendererInterface. Note however that the render pass (or passes) are already recorded at this point and it is not possible to add more commands within the scenegraph's pass. Instead, use afterRenderPassRecording() for that. This signal has therefore limited use in Qt 6, unlike in Qt 5. Rather, it is the combination of beforeRendering() and beforeRenderPassRecording(), or beforeRendering() and afterRenderPassRecording(), that is typically used to achieve under- or overlaying of the custom rendering.
trans-unit.target: 场景图将其命令添加到命令缓冲区（尚未提交到图形队列）后，将发出该信号。如果需要，连接到该信号的插槽功能可以在通过QSGRendererInterface之前查询本机资源，例如命令缓冲区。但是请注意，渲染通行证（或多个通行证）此时已被记录，并且无法在场景图形的通行证中添加更多命令。而是使用afterRenderPassRecording（）。因此，该信号具有有限的使用Qt中的6，不像在Qt的5相反，它是组合beforeRendering（）和beforeRenderPassRecording（），或beforeRendering（）和afterRenderPassRecording（），通常用于实现自定义渲染的不足或重叠。

trans-unit.source: The signal is emitted as soon as the most important device information has been collected. However, as long as the finished() signal has not been emitted the information collection continues even for already discovered devices. This is particularly true for signal strength information (RSSI) and manufacturer data updates. If the use case requires continuous manufacturer data or RSSI updates it is advisable to retrieve the device information via discoveredDevices() once the discovery has finished or listen to the deviceUpdated() signal.
trans-unit.target: 一旦收集到最重要的设备信息，便会发出信号。但是，只要没有发出finish（）信号，即使对于已经发现的设备，信息收集也会继续。对于信号强度信息（RSSI）和制造商数据更新尤其如此。如果用例需要连续的制造商数据或RSSI更新，则建议在发现完成后通过发现设备（）检索设备信息，或者侦听deviceUpdated（）信号。

trans-unit.source: The signal is emitted before the document's layout manager is notified about the change. This hook allows you to implement syntax highlighting for the document.
trans-unit.target: 该信号在文档的布局管理器收到变更通知之前就会发出。这个钩子允许你为文档实现语法高亮。

trans-unit.source: The signal is emitted when the active streams list is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当活动流列表发生变化时,该信号就会发出。

trans-unit.source: The signal must be a function declared as a signal in the header. The slot function can be any function or functor that can be connected to the signal. A function can be connected to a given signal if the signal has at least as many argument as the slot. A functor can be connected to a signal if they have exactly the same number of arguments. There must exist implicit conversion between the types of the corresponding arguments in the signal and the slot.
trans-unit.target: 信号必须是在头中声明为信号的函数。槽函数可以是任何可以连接到信号的函数或漏斗。如果一个函数的参数至少和槽函数的参数一样多,那么它就可以连接到一个给定的信号上。一个漏斗可以连接到一个信号,如果他们有完全相同的参数数。信号和槽中相应参数的类型之间必须存在隐式转换。

trans-unit.source: The signal must be a function declared as a signal in the header. The slot function can be any function or functor that can be connected to the signal. A slot function can be connected to a given signal if the signal has at least as many arguments as the slot function. There must exist implicit conversion between the types of the corresponding arguments in the signal and the slot.
trans-unit.target: 信号必须是在头中声明为信号的函数。槽函数可以是任何可以连接到信号的函数或漏斗。如果信号的参数至少和槽函数一样多,那么槽函数可以连接到给定的信号上。信号和槽函数中相应参数的类型之间必须存在隐式转换。

trans-unit.source: The signals and slots connections defined for compile time or run time forms can either be set up manually or automatically, using QMetaObject's ability to make connections between signals and suitably-named slots.
trans-unit.target: 使用QMetaObject在信号和适当命名的插槽之间建立连接的功能，可以手动或自动设置为编译时或运行时形式定义的信号和插槽连接。

trans-unit.source: The signals and slots mechanism is type safe: The signature of a signal must match the signature of the receiving slot. (In fact a slot may have a shorter signature than the signal it receives because it can ignore extra arguments.) Since the signatures are compatible, the compiler can help us detect type mismatches when using the function pointer-based syntax. The string-based SIGNAL and SLOT syntax will detect type mismatches at runtime. Signals and slots are loosely coupled: A class which emits a signal neither knows nor cares which slots receive the signal. Qt's signals and slots mechanism ensures that if you connect a signal to a slot, the slot will be called with the signal's parameters at the right time. Signals and slots can take any number of arguments of any type. They are completely type safe.
trans-unit.target: 信号和槽位机制是类型安全的。信号的签名必须与接收槽的签名相匹配(事实上,一个槽的签名可能比它接收的信号短,因为它可以忽略额外的参数)。(事实上,一个槽的签名可能比它接收的信号短,因为它可以忽略额外的参数。)由于签名是兼容的,编译器可以帮助我们在使用基于函数指针的语法时检测类型不匹配。基于字符串的signal和slot语法将在运行时检测类型不匹配。信号和槽是松散耦合的。一个发出信号的类既不知道也不关心哪个槽接收信号。Qt的信号和插槽机制保证了如果你把一个信号连接到一个插槽上,插槽会在适当的时候用信号的参数被调用。信号和插槽可以接受任何类型的任何数量的参数。它们完全是类型安全的。

trans-unit.source: The signals emitted by the functions called in implementations of the resizing API give attached components the chance to take action before any data becomes unavailable. The encapsulation of insert and remove operations with begin and end functions also enable the model to manage persistent model indexes correctly.

trans-unit.source: The simple text item can have both a fill and an outline; setBrush() will set the text fill (i.e., text color), and setPen() sets the pen that will be used to draw the text outline. (The latter can be slow, especially for complex pens, and items with long text content.) If all you want is to draw a simple line of text, you should call setBrush() only, and leave the pen unset; QGraphicsSimpleTextItem's pen is by default Qt::NoPen.
trans-unit.target: 简单文本项可以同时具有填充和轮廓。setBrush（）将设置文本填充（即，文本颜色），而setPen（）将设置用于绘制文本轮廓的笔。（后者可能会很慢，尤其是对于复杂的笔和带有长文本内容的项目。）如果只想绘制简单的文本行，则应仅调用setBrush（），并保持笔未设置；QGraphicsSimpleTextItem的笔默认为Qt :: NoPen。

trans-unit.source: The simple text item can have both a fill and an outline; setBrush() will set the text fill (i.e., text color), and setPen() sets the pen that will be used to draw the text outline. (The latter can be slow, especially for complex pens, and items with long text content.) If all you want is to draw a simple line of text, you should call setBrush() only, and leave the pen unset; QGraphicsSimpleTextItem's pen is by default Qt::NoPen.
trans-unit.target: 简单文本项可以同时具有填充和轮廓。setBrush（）将设置文本填充（即，文本颜色），而setPen（）将设置用于绘制文本轮廓的笔。（后者可能会很慢，尤其是对于复杂的笔和带有长文本内容的项目。）如果只想绘制简单的文本行，则应仅调用setBrush（），并保持笔未设置；否则，设置为0。QGraphicsSimpleTextItem的笔默认为Qt :: NoPen。

trans-unit.source: The simplest way of drawing this list is on a cell-by-cell basis. First, the background is drawn. This is a rectangle of a specific color. In OpenGL terms this means selecting a shader program to do solid color fills, setting up the fill color, setting the transformation matrix containing the x and y offsets and then using for instance glDrawArrays to draw two triangles making up the rectangle. The icon is drawn next. In OpenGL terms this means selecting a shader program to draw textures, selecting the active texture to use, setting the transformation matrix, enabling alpha-blending and then using for instance glDrawArrays to draw the two triangles making up the bounding rectangle of the icon. The text and separator line between cells follow a similar pattern. And this process is repeated for every cell in the list, so for a longer list, the overhead imposed by OpenGL state changes and draw calls completely outweighs the benefit that using a hardware accelerated API could provide.
trans-unit.target: 绘制此列表的最简单方法是逐个单元地进行。首先，绘制背景。这是特定颜色的矩形。在OpenGL术语中，这意味着选择着色器程序进行纯色填充，设置填充颜色，设置包含x和y偏移量的转换矩阵，然后使用例如 glDrawArrays 绘制组成矩形的两个三角形。接下来绘制图标。用OpenGL术语，这意味着选择一个着色器程序来绘制纹理，选择要使用的活动纹理，设置转换矩阵，启用alpha混合，然后使用例如 glDrawArrays 绘制组成图标边界矩形的两个三角形。单元格之间的文本和分隔线遵循类似的模式。并且对于列表中的每个单元重复此过程，因此对于更长的列表，OpenGL状态更改和绘制调用所带来的开销完全超过了使用硬件加速API所能提供的好处。

trans-unit.source: The simulation loop is launched as soon as a root Qt3DCore::QEntity is set on the Qt3DCore::QAspectEngine. This is followed by a call to onEngineStartup() on each aspect so that they can start their simulation work.
trans-unit.target: 模拟环路启动，只要根Qt3DCore :: QEntity是在设置Qt3DCore :: QAspectEngine。接下来是在每个方面对onEngineStartup（）的调用，以便他们可以开始其模拟工作。

trans-unit.source: The simulation loop is stopped when the root entity is set to Qt3DCore::QEntityPtr(). This calls onEngineShutdown() on each aspect so that they can stop performing their simulation work.
trans-unit.target: 当根实体被设置为Qt3DCore::QEntityPtr()时,模拟循环就会停止。这将在每个方面调用onEngineShutdown(),这样它们就可以停止执行它们的模拟工作。

trans-unit.source: The size of the surface is accessible with the size() function. The rendering specific attributes of the surface are accessible through the format() function.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用size（）函数访问表面的大小。可通过format（）函数访问表面的渲染特定属性。

trans-unit.source: The size of this array must be at least (textureDataWidth * textureHeight * textureDepth * texture format color depth in bytes).
trans-unit.target: 此数组的大小必须至少为（ textureDataWidth * textureHeight * textureDepth * texture format color depth in bytes ））。

trans-unit.source: The size of toolbar icons can be retrieved with iconSize(). The sizes are platform dependent; you can set a fixed size with setIconSize(). You can alter the appearance of all tool buttons in the toolbars with setToolButtonStyle().
trans-unit.target: 工具栏图标的大小可以使用 iconSize() 获取。大小取决于平台；您可以使用 setIconSize() 设置固定大小。您可以使用 setToolButtonStyle() 更改工具栏中所有工具按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: The size policy lets you supply good default behavior for the layout management system, so that other widgets can contain and manage yours easily. The default size policy indicates that the size hint represents the preferred size of the widget, and this is often good enough for many widgets.
trans-unit.target: 大小策略让您可以为布局管理系统提供良好的默认行为,以便其他小组件可以轻松地包含和管理您的小组件。默认尺寸策略表示尺寸提示代表了小组件的首选尺寸,这对许多小组件来说通常已经足够好了。

trans-unit.source: The size policy of a widget is an expression of its willingness to be resized in various ways, and affects how the widget is treated by the layout engine. Each widget returns a QSizePolicy that describes the horizontal and vertical resizing policy it prefers when being laid out. You can change this for a specific widget by changing its QWidget::sizePolicy property.
trans-unit.target: 小部件的大小策略是其以各种方式调整大小的意愿的表达，并且影响布局引擎如何处理小部件。每个小部件都返回一个QSizePolicy，描述其布局时首选的水平和垂直大小调整策略。您可以通过更改其QWidget :: sizePolicy属性来为特定的窗口小部件更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: The size policy of a widget is an expression of its willingness to be resized in various ways, and affects how the widget is treated by the layout engine. Each widget returns a QSizePolicy that describes the horizontal and vertical resizing policy it prefers when being laid out. You can change this for a specific widget by changing its QWidget::sizePolicy property.
trans-unit.target: 小部件的大小策略是其以各种方式调整大小的意愿的表达，并且影响布局引擎如何处理小部件。每个小部件都返回一个QSizePolicy，描述其布局时首选的水平和垂直大小调整策略。您可以通过更改其QWidget :: sizePolicy属性来为特定的窗口小部件更改此设置。

trans-unit.source: The size requested for the window geometry by the positioner object.
trans-unit.target: 定位器对象要求的窗口几何尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() is a maximum. The widget can be shrunk any amount without detriment if other widgets need the space (e.g. a separator line). It cannot be larger than the size provided by sizeHint().
trans-unit.target: sizeHint()是一个最大值。如果其他小组件需要空间(如分隔线),小组件可以无损地缩小任何数量。它不能大于sizeHint()提供的大小。

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() is a sensible size, but the widget can be shrunk and still be useful. The widget can make use of extra space, so it should get as much space as possible (e.g. the horizontal direction of a horizontal slider).
trans-unit.target: sizeHint()是一个合理的大小,但小组件可以被缩小,仍然有用。小组件可以利用额外的空间,所以它应该获得尽可能多的空间(例如,水平滑块的水平方向)。

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() is best, but the widget can be shrunk and still be useful. The widget can be expanded, but there is no advantage to it being larger than sizeHint() (the default QWidget policy).
trans-unit.target: sizeHint（）是最好的，但是小部件可以缩小并且仍然有用。可以扩展该小部件，但使其大于sizeHint（）（默认的QWidget策略）没有任何好处。

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() is best, but the widget can be shrunk and still be useful. The widget can be expanded, but there is no advantage to it being larger than sizeHint() (the default QWidget policy).
trans-unit.target: sizeHint（）最好，但是该窗口小部件可以缩小并且仍然有用。可以扩展该小部件，但没有任何优势使其大于sizeHint（）（默认的QWidget策略）。

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() is ignored. The widget will get as much space as possible.
trans-unit.target: sizeHint()被忽略。小组件将获得尽可能多的空间。

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() is minimal, and sufficient. The widget can be expanded, but there is no advantage to it being larger (e.g. the horizontal direction of a push button). It cannot be smaller than the size provided by sizeHint().
trans-unit.target: sizeHint()是最小的,也是足够的。小组件可以扩展,但没有任何好处,它是更大的(例如,按钮的水平方向)。它不能小于sizeHint()提供的大小。

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() is minimal, and sufficient. The widget can make use of extra space, so it should get as much space as possible (e.g. the horizontal direction of a horizontal slider).
trans-unit.target: sizeHint()是最小的,也是足够的。小组件可以利用额外的空间,所以它应该获得尽可能多的空间(例如,水平滑块的水平方向)。

trans-unit.source: The slider can be styled using the ::handle subcontrol. Setting the min-width or min-height provides size contraints for the slider depending on the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用:: handle子控件设置滑块的样式。设置最小宽度或最小高度会根据方向为滑块提供尺寸限制。

trans-unit.source: The slider can be styled using the ::handle subcontrol. Setting the min-width or min-height provides size contraints for the slider depending on the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用:: handle子控件设置滑块的样式。设置最小宽度或最小高度会根据方向为滑块提供尺寸限制。

trans-unit.source: The slider does not snap (default).
trans-unit.target: 滑块不会被扣住(默认)。

trans-unit.source: The slider does not snap while being dragged, but only after the handle is released.
trans-unit.target: 滑块在被拖动的过程中不会卡住,只有在松开手柄后才会卡住。

trans-unit.source: The slider forces the value to be within the legal range: minimum <= value <= maximum.
trans-unit.target: 滑块将值强制在合法范围内：最小值 <= value <= 最大值。

trans-unit.source: The slider is a complex control that functions as a Controller for its accessible children. This relationship must be known by the interface (for parent(), child() and relations()). This can be done using a controlling signal, which is a mechanism provided by QAccessibleWidget. We do this in the constructor:
trans-unit.target: 滑块是一个复杂的控件，充当可访问子控件的控制器。接口必须知道此关系（对于parent（），child（）和Relationship（））。这可以使用控制信号来完成，这是QAccessibleWidget提供的机制。我们在构造函数中执行此操作：

trans-unit.source: The slider is the classic control for providing a bounded value. It lets the user move a slider handle along a horizontal or vertical groove and translates the handle's position into a value within the legal range.
trans-unit.target: 滑块是提供一个有界值的经典控件,它让用户沿着水平或垂直的凹槽移动滑块手柄,并将手柄的位置转化为法定范围内的数值。它让用户沿着水平或垂直的沟槽移动滑块手柄,并将手柄的位置转化为法定范围内的数值。

trans-unit.source: The slider is the classic widget for controlling a bounded value. It lets the user move a slider handle along a horizontal or vertical groove and translates the handle's position into an integer value within the legal range.
trans-unit.target: 滑块是控制一个有界值的经典部件。它让用户沿着水平或垂直的沟槽移动滑块手柄,并将手柄的位置转化为法定范围内的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The slider itself can be controlled by using the triggerAction() function to simulate user interaction with the scroll bar controls. This is useful if you have many different widgets that use a common range of values.
trans-unit.target: 滑块本身可以通过使用triggerAction（）函数来控制，以模拟用户与滚动条控件的交互。如果您有许多使用共同值范围的不同小部件，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: The slider snaps while the handle is dragged.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动手柄的同时,滑块卡住。

trans-unit.source: The slider style allows you to create a custom appearance for a Slider control.
trans-unit.target: 滑块样式使您可以为Slider控件创建自定义外观。

trans-unit.source: The slider value is by default in the range [0, 1]. If integer values are needed, you can set the stepSize.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，滑块值在[0，1]范围内。如果需要整数值，则可以设置stepSize。

trans-unit.source: The slot is invoked immediately when the signal is emitted. The slot is executed in the signalling thread.
trans-unit.target: 当信号发出后,该槽立即被调用。该槽在信号线程中执行。

trans-unit.source: The slot is invoked when control returns to the event loop of the receiver's thread. The slot is executed in the receiver's thread.
trans-unit.target: 当控制返回到接收器线程的事件循环时,该槽被调用。该槽在接收方的线程中执行。

trans-unit.source: The slot is invoked when the results are ready. The results are stored in a QHostInfo object. Call addresses() to get the list of IP addresses for the host, and hostName() to get the host name that was looked up.
trans-unit.target: 结果准备好后，将调用该插槽。结果存储在QHostInfo对象中。调用地址（）以获得主机的IP地址列表，并调用hostName（）以获得所查找的主机名。

trans-unit.source: The slot is invoked when the results are ready. The results are stored in a QHostInfo object. Call addresses() to get the list of IP addresses for the host, and hostName() to get the host name that was looked up.

trans-unit.target: 每次将数据报写入网络时，套接字都会发出bytesWritten（）信号。如果只想发送数据报，则无需调用bind（）。
